FCCANALYSIS(1) fccanalysis man page FCCANALYSIS(1)

NAME

fccanalysis - build and run your FCC analysis

SYNOPSIS

fccanalysis [-h | --help] <command> [<args>]

DESCRIPTION

fccanalysis is the manager program for the FCC analysis, which can build, run or submit analysis to the batch.

OPTIONS

--help

Prints short help message and exits.

COMMANDS

fccanalysis-init

[Experimental] Generate a RDataFrame based FCC analysis.

fccanalysis-build

Builds and installs the FCCAnalyses framework.

fccanalysis-pin

Pin analysis to the currently sourced version of the Key4hep stack.

fccanalysis-run(1)

Runs the stage analysis file provided.

fccanalysis-final

Runs the finalization analysis file provided.

fccanalysis-plots

Generate plots based on the plots analysis file provided.

SEE ALSO

fccanalysis-run(1), fccanalysis-file(7)

BUGS

Many

AUTHORS

There are many contributors to the FCCAnalyses framework, but the principal authors are:

Clement Helsens
Valentin Volk
Gerardo Ganis

FCCANALYSES

Part of the FCCAnalyses framework.
